universe_note: Universe limited to provided packets (NASDAQ/NYSE). Liquidity gate applied: avg_dollar_volume_20d >= 50,000,000 and price >= 2.00. Catalyst/news verification required within 7 trading days cannot be satisfied because packets contain no headlines and earnings dates are Unknown; Catalyst scores capped per rules.
